officialTitle: Digital Breast Tomosynthesis Versus Digital Mammography in a Population-based Screening Program. A Controlled Randomized Multicenter Trial
inclusionCriteria:
* Asymptomatic women 45-68 years, residents in the Piedmont Region, attending the regional breast cancer screening program
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 46 Years
* Must have maximum age of 68 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Personal history of breast cancer
* A terminal illness
* Patients who are unable to give informed consent
* Breast implants
